description:
Telescope Specification
Model: Planewave CDK24
Aperture: 610 mm (24 inches)
Focal Length: 3962 mm
F-ratio: 6.5
Mount: Mathis MI-1000/1250 with absolute encoders
Minimum elevation: 30 degrees

Camera Specification
Model: FLI PL 9000
Pixel Size: 12 μm
Pixel Array: 3056 x 3056
Pixel Resolution: 0.62 arcsec/pixel
Cooling: -30 degrees
Field of View: 31.8 x 31.8 arcmin
Filters(50mm square): Astrodon Ha (3nm), OIII (3nm), SII (3nm).
Position angle: 359.36 degrees

AND 

Telescope Specification
Aperture: 500 mm (19.6 inches)
Focal Length: 1900 mm
F-ratio: 3.8
Mount: ASA DDM85 equatorial mount with direct drives
Minimum elevation: 30 degrees

Camera Specification
Model: FLI PL 16803
Pixel Size: 9 μm
Pixel Array: 4096 x 4096
Pixel Resolution: 0.98 arcsec/pixel
Cooling: -25 degrees in Summer, -30 in Winter
Field of View: 65 x 65 arcmin
Filters (50mm square): Astrodon Ha (3nm), SII (3nm), OIII (3nm)
Position angle: 270 degrees

FRAMES / SUBS
Lights (filter SII) 4 x 600 sec
Lights (filter H-alpha) 4 x 600 sec
Lights (filter OIII) 4 x 600 sec
Total lights integration time 2:00 hours

ACQUISITION
Date Sat Mar 27th 2021
title: NGC 6188 Fighting Dragons of Ara 20210327 7200s LSHO 01.5.4
